caption.title: Alignment of cloned DVGs sequences.
caption.p: PCR amplified DVGs clones of PB2 segment from (A) M-IAV (clones 1 and 2) and F-IAV clinical isolates, or (B) PA mut and PB2 mut recombinant viruses are aligned with the A/Cal/04/09 reference sequence. Dotted lines denote UTR sequences, Red rectangles denote primers for DGs sequencing, Pink rectangles denote PB2 sequences.
Click here for additional data file.
